website_summaries.verdict: This fun infant play set is great for developing motor skills and learning the alphabet.
pros: Comes with 3 rolling wheelbases and blocks featuring letters from A to Z
When the smokestack is pressed, the train makes sounds and plays music
cons: Not as intuitive to build as other sets

customer_reviews.title: Be creative and fix any issues...
customer_reviews.text: Opened it today and the kiddo is so happy the train makes noise (toot toot and some short music, not obnoxious at all) and it was easy to quickly assemble the train cars but unfortunately we don't have a complete alphabet. Easy to fix if you have extra mega blocks and a sharpie, so still a good toy and learning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind cool
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo love trains, so this seemed like a great Christmas present. He does like it enough, but I think it's kind of boring. It only plays 1 song (ABC's) and it stops halfway through and you have to push the button for it to continue. I chose this one over some other Mega Blok options because the letters are printed on. My kid loves to pick off stickers and I'm so tired of placing stickers on toys, especially when I know he'll peel them off.
customer_reviews.author: kirkae

customer_reviews.title: Super cute train set
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 yr old is a big fan of trains. The moment we opened the box he started to ask us to play with him. And he really loved it. One good thing is we already get some mega blocks, it creates extra fun when we built bridges together and let the train pass the tower bridge. It is a great toy for the little hands. We love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Q. C.

customer_reviews.title: Fanstastic though package wasn’t new
customer_reviews.text: Thank god it wasn’t a gift as the package was tampered and cut through in horrible condition. Didn’t return as my child loved the items and I counted all blocks were present in box though they appeared to be used or returned. Its easy to play with as blocks connect and disconnect softly. Good learning activity.
customer_reviews.author: True feedback

customer_reviews.title: mega blocks train set
customer_reviews.text: my son is just 1year and 4 months and he loves them . easy to assemble and easy to take apart . great for his motor skill development.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an 18 month old
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift for a one-and-a-half-year-old. Even my five-year-old son loves it. The song is short and sweet that it makes her sing her ABCs in small segments. Her big brother helps her connect the train cars but she learns quickly as easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this. He plays with it all the time. He loves Mega Blocks and he (26 months) grabbed the bag they came in and pointed to this train for 2 months and went crazy when he got it for Easter. He loves trains and blocks. The best of both worlds for him.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Carter

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed these blocks low because they do not keep their form after putting them together a few times. Now most of the pieces will not stay interlocked and makes my son very frustrated when playing. But the fact that the toy is malfunctioning it plays a teachable moment for me to tell him to move on to the next piece. But soon the next piece will lose its form as well. It is serving it's purpose during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Trae JaySeme

customer_reviews.title: Cute little train
customer_reviews.text: Cute little train, I got the whole set of Alphabet with an extra F. We have another set of Mega Bloks, my little one enjoys building weird stuff on this train LOL
customer_reviews.author: Shadowglen Elf

customer_reviews.title: Missing letter
customer_reviews.text: We’re missing “X” and got a repeated “P” instead. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a mega blocks collection.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, who is 2 1/2 loves his mega blocks. When he starting loving trains I thought this was a perfect addition to the collection. He has quite a few! Very worthwhile purchase, as he grows his building designs will grow with him. Fun for grownups as well .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Babalonis

customer_reviews.title: Great for my two year old
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my two year old. He won’t stop playing with them
customer_reviews.author: Yavi

customer_reviews.title: My toddler grandchildren love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and simplicity of handling the blocks. Both my 2+ year old grandchildren love to play with it as a train and simply stacking.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! So much fun! Great option if you’re just looking for a alternative to the regular blocks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great add on to megablocks sets
customer_reviews.text: This is a good addition to our megablocks set. My boys love trains and blocks, so purchasing this was a win.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to original set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter spotted this on the original pack of these blocks and asked for it. I quickly found it on Amazon for a good price and ordered it. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Lee

customer_reviews.title: Used product with subpar quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is ok compared to other FP products, also had stains and scratches, didn’t wanted to go through returning process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My god daughter loves this train.
customer_reviews.text: Great train! It’s sturdy and allows her to use her imagination. The best part is, it’s toddler finger friendly and, therefore, frustration free. Her friends love it, too. Perfect gift for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for an 18 month old and older
customer_reviews.text: Legos, colors, alphabet, and a train. What’s not to love? Hours of play!
customer_reviews.author: Pierrette D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that the sound is quiet and sweet. There is no volume adjustment but haven’t needed it. It is easy for my almost 2 year old to build and play with.
customer_reviews.author: Snooz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Train doesn’t stay together very well, blocks are weak at connecting. No storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: In love with. I bought this for a gift and the baby love it. Really educative.
customer_reviews.author: Lesly Robles

customer_reviews.title: 2 yr old nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. 2 year old nephew loves it. He made it into two seperate cars instead of a train but hey . As long as he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy but missing a letter
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves this! It's fun, brightly colored and a great learning activity. I only gave 3 stars because the alphabet blocks were missing a K and had two Q's...
customer_reviews.author: jess.thomas906

customer_reviews.title: Great set for your toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson. Wiatt a delightful addition to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Drum1Mom

customer_reviews.title: Product is in box only...no storage
customer_reviews.text: Product is great the only problem is that it comes in a box..no storage option for my 2 year old. This would be grear in a bag with handles.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old has been playing with it non stop for a week.
customer_reviews.author: alissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived new in perfect working condition! My daughter will love it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: College student

customer_reviews.title: Choo choo!!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves it. Especially the choo choo engine
customer_reviews.author: Divya S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing alphabets defeats purpose for an educational toy.
customer_reviews.text: Well it's useless for us. Came in with no 'N' and two 'M' s instead. Poor quality control. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chintan Shah

customer_reviews.title: Cute, works well with our other mega blok sets
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoys building the trains and cars and everything else he can think of, very cute
customer_reviews.author: Lori Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Too loose
customer_reviews.text: Blocks are too loose when you stack them. They do not hold together. Simple task like using the block to spell my son’s name. They fall apart if you sneeze on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Missing alphabet
customer_reviews.text: We sorted through all the little blocks. 2 Ss and 2 Fs in this one. No U or X.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: He is just hitting the block-building age and this is a fun way for him to build and re-build. He also loves the alphabet so he can put them in order, and he loves that the train plays music, too.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Scharff

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons play with these everyday. They are fully entertained and building their fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Katina

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Product could be a little bigger & sturdier. Still fine for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amy Green

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is only a year, but loved the music and that it has wheels. Blocks and letters and colors will come next.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lent

customer_reviews.title: great teaching toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy will go from 1 year to 5 yr teaching the alphabet and just playing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Street

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great looking gift! Makes train sound and definitely great for small hands! My son had the biggest smile when he saw it and played with it for hours! Definitely has bright colors!
customer_reviews.author: AKlaus

customer_reviews.title: Not interesting for toddler.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old Grandson. He was more interested in playing with the dog toys than the train. The train is colorful and plays a short tune. It did not capture his interest.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY S. LAMB

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it easy to put together. I had hoped it would sing the ABC song but it just plays the music instrumental
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it very much! It is very bright and he likes to play with the train a lot
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son but I am the one who plays with it. Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Leanora Shay

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good product but I was little disappointed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product an absolute must have
customer_reviews.text: Great toy loads of fun. My 2year old and his friends all love this toy and he still plays with the sounds. Noises arent to loud to irritate the adultsw
customer_reviews.author: Neeru raghi

customer_reviews.title: Great for smart 2 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old Granddaughter loves the way it plays music while she plays with stacking blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Having to buy another because my grandson and grad- daughter want it at the same time. They really enjoy it !
customer_reviews.author: david griffin

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, nice that the horn blows, but not too much :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: toy train
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this & played with it for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Gerri H

customer_reviews.title: Train good
customer_reviews.text: I love the train only one thing I miss one letter I have twice hh but the block are pretty my boy love that
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Fun learning with play time.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves the mega blocks and this was the only set I could find with multiple wheel sets. Fun time play and added learning with the alphabet blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson loved his new toys
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the blocks for our 20 month old. He has some good toys to play with at Mom Mom's house. I used to buy Fisher Price toys for my daughters and was never disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Janie Hecker

customer_reviews.title: Great product sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Strong, cute and allows them to use their imagination. My son made a dragon and a robot all without my input. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It great
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except it doesn't play the alphabet song
customer_reviews.author: Habiba

customer_reviews.title: more of same
customer_reviews.text: I had more plain ones with a cart and wanted to add creativity like the legos and this is OK for the 1st but not if you want to add.More music would have helped
customer_reviews.author: usha varma

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays with it everyday. Its very colorful and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Very good. I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The toy quality that buys to the baby is very good, have no peculiar smell healthy baby plays also rest assured
customer_reviews.author: marie camara

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: This toy would be great for a kid under 2. I bought it for my son's second birthday and for some reason, he isn't as into it as he is the normal mega blocks. But the toy itself is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great looking item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured!!! Can't wait to see my grandson's reaction to it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Only thing wrong with it is that the full ABC song doesn’t play other than that perfect toy for my nephews!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Well received gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a child's birthday gift and as soon as he saw it he did not want to give it up to open other gifts
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great for growing minds
customer_reviews.text: Great for my little man and his little cousin. They were a hit and they fit snug enough for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $20
customer_reviews.text: Makes just the one sound, not a whole lot of blocks and really just worth about half the price that was paid.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Switser

customer_reviews.title: Missing wheel
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this train, but we were disappointed that a yellow wheel was missing so can’t really use the whole train.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl pickering

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful toy to help teach the alphabet, letter recognition and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves mega blocks so this easily was a big hit for him. He was making trains with it the first week but lost interest in the musical part of the train so now just uses the other parts to build race cars.
customer_reviews.author: JBMTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great value - well made - fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old loves the button that makes the sound and loves the wheel bases - while he isn’t quite into building the “train” yet, he loves the pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Brickfan

product_meta.title: Mega Bloks ABC Musical Train
product_meta.description: Style:ABC Musical TrainAll aboard with an alphabet train that makes real sounds and music! Your little one will be on the fast track to learning their ABCs when they build a musical train printed with the letters A through Z! Connect the three rolling wheelbases together and stack the letter blocks on top to learn the alphabet or even build whole words. Then press down on the train's smokestack and discover real train sounds as well as a song to add musical magic to your alphabet adventure! Ideal for ages 1 to 5
feature_bullets: ​ Easy-to-build, musical train for learning the alphabet
​ Press the smokestack for real train sounds and music
​ 50-piece playset includes 3 rolling wheelbases, building blocks and special train shapes
​ Blocks come printed with all the letters A through Z
​ Hands-on play for early childhood development
​ Combine with other Mega Bloks preschool toys and build them up!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,400 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
